message: Hello Bob, I'm excited to offer you this amazing product! I think you'll really love it. I'm willing to sell it to you for $200.
I'm really interested in the product, but $200 is a bit out of my budget. I'd be willing to pay $150 for it.

I understand that $200 is a bit steep for you, Bob. However, I'm willing to meet you in the middle. I can offer it to you for $175. It's a great deal, and I think you won't find a better price anywhere else!
I appreciate your willingness to meet me in the middle, but $175 is still a bit too high for me. I'd be willing to pay $140 for the product.

I'm starting to think we're getting close to a deal, Bob! I can see you're really interested in the product. I'm willing to make one more concession. I can offer it to you for $165. This is as low as I'm willing to go, but I think it's still a great deal for you!
I appreciate your willingness to make concessions, but $165 is still a bit above my budget. I'd be willing to pay $155 for the product.
